entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
